item.title: MUC Slow mode
item.description: The livechat plugin includes a “slow mode” feature, to rate limit the number of messages that a user can send to a given MUC room. At time of writing, there were no XEP to describe such feature. Please find below a XEP draft, that will be submitted for review. Work In Progress, this page is not done yet. For an updated version of this documented, you can check the draft XEP XMP file.
